https://xxyxyz.org/line-breaking/

Imports

colorstring, halgorithm

Types

WordKind = enum
  wkText, wkNewline, wkPunctuation, wkSpace, wkMarkup
Word[Text; Attr] = object
  text*: Text
  attr*: Attr
  forceNl: bool
  isBreaking: bool
  kind*: WordKind

TermWord = Word[string, PrintStyling]
TextWord[T] = Word[string, T]
UnicodeWord[T] = Word[seq[Rune], T]

Lets

defaultHyphenPattTree: PattTree = block:
  var res = PattTree(isFinal: false, sub: newTable(32))
  for patt in items(patternList):
    insertPattern(res, patt)
  res
defaultHyphenExceptionList: Table[string, seq[int]] = block:
  var res: Table[string, seq[int]]
  for exc in items(hyphenationExceptions):
    var points = @[0]
    for spl in split(exc, {'a'..'z', 'A'..'Z'}, -1):
      if spl == "-":
        add(points, 1)
      else:
        add(points, 0)
    res[replace(exc, "-", "")] = points
  res
